column5: hello everyone, been away awhile, busy with work etc not much time to fish! finally i have made plans to take a trip to Caygeon Cove - Bob Caygeon now i am wondering if anyone has stayed or fished there.... any information can and will be helpful, thanks all!!! HB

try the big creek mouth south of bobcaygeon (sturgeon lake) for muskie and walleye.  work deep weedlines.  i used minnow immitation crank baits.  i'm sure there are bass there to just never tried for them.  good luck!
